ValidationRule.description: Prevent the PEO tracking number from being cleared, except by System Admin
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( PEO_Tracking_DB_ID__c ) && IsBlank( PEO_Tracking_DB_ID__c ) && NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The PEO Tracking DB ID cannot be cleared.
